Jobs at Rotati Consulting

  • Home
  • Jobs

Rotati Consulting is a modern, dynamic, agile software development shop specializing in building web and mobile applications for startups, entrepreneurs and agencies. We have hundreds of exciting projects to work on and we want YOU to join our team! Whether you have just graduated or have a few years of experience under your belt - consider Rotati for your next career move!

Rotati offers all its staff, occasional lunch outings, evening events / parties, hack days (work on your own ideas), regular in house and, occasionally, overseas training sessions and market leading salaries!

Checkout our available positions below. If your interested send your letter and CV to jobs(at)rotati.com

Senior Rails / MVC Developer

Rotati Consulting is seeking an experienced Rails / MVC Developer to be part of our growing team of Developers. You will have:

  • More than 3 years of professional software development experience
  • Have most of your experience working with an MVC style framework (preferably Rails).
  • Have excellent knowledge of web development
  • Have an excellent understanding of JavaScript
  • Have an excellent understanding of TDD (preferably using RSpec)
  • Be a fast learner and interested in new technology
  • Have an excellent command of English

Senior JavaScript Developer

Rotati Consulting is seeking an experienced JavaScript Developer to be part of our growing team of Developers. You will have:

  • More than 3 years of professional software development experience
  • Understand and have tried Angular JS or React JS
  • Have an excellent knowledge of web development
  • Be a fast learner and interested in new technology
  • Have an excellent command of English

Senior Mobile App Developer

Rotati Consulting is seeking an experienced Mobile App Developer to be part of our growing team of Developers. You will have:

  • More than 3 years of professional software development experience
  • Have experience of building native Android and / or iOS apps
  • Understand and have tried building mobile apps using Cordova (or similar e.g. PhoneGap or Ionic) or React Native (or similar e.g. Angular JS)
  • Have excellent knowledge of mobile app development
  • Be a fast learner and interested in new technology
  • Have an excellent command of English

Junior Rails / MVC Developer

Rotati Consulting is seeking a junior Rails / MVC Developer to be part of our growing team of Developers. You will have:

  • At least 1 year of professional software development experience
  • Have most of your experience working with an MVC style framework (preferably Rails).
  • Have excellent knowledge of web development
  • Have a good understanding of JavaScript
  • Have a good understanding of TDD (preferably using RSpec)
  • Be a fast learner and interested in new technology
  • Have an excellent command of English

Junior JavaScript Developer

Rotati Consulting is seeking a junior JavaScript Developer to be part of our growing team of Developers. You will have:

  • At least 1 year of professional software development experience
  • Have tried Angular JS or React JS.
  • Have excellent knowledge of web development
  • Be a fast learner and interested in new technology
  • Have an excellent command of English
